entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
